'''Anthony Gomes''' (born May 14, 1970, [[Toronto]], [[Ontario]], [[Canada]]) is a [[Canada|Canadian]] [[blues]] and [[blues rock]] [[guitarist]] and [[singer]]. He was born to a [[Portugal|Portuguese]] father and a [[French-Canadian]] mother. After his 1998 debut [[album]] release ''Blues in Technicolor'', he began touring the [[United States]] and Canada and he has since recorded eight more albums.

Gomes resides in [[St. Louis]], [[Missouri]], United States,  playing a fusion of blues with [[rock music|rock]] and [[soul music|soul]], and with the Anthony Gomes Band has toured [[North America]] and [[Europe]].<ref>{{cite web|accessdate=20 September 2011|publisher=allmusic|title=Anthony Gomes Band|url=http://www.allmusic.com/artist/anthony-gomes-band-p384400}}</ref>

==Discography==
* 1998 - ''Blues in Technicolor'' (Urban Electric)
* 2000 - ''Sweet Stringin' Soul'' (Urban Electric)
* 2002 - ''Unity'' (33rd Street Records)
* 2006 - ''Music Is The Medicine'' (Adrenaline)
* 2006 - ''Long Way Home''
* 2008 - ''Anthony Gomes Live''
* 2008 - ''Primary Colors''
* 2009 - ''Rebel Blue''
* 2009 - ''New Soul Cowboys''
* 2012 - ''Up 2 Zero''
* 2013 - ''... Before The Beginning''

==Awards==
* 1998: Buddy Guy's Legends "Best Unsigned Blues Band"
* 2003: BluesWax Artist of the Year
